Articles.Content:
I've created a couple of custom nodes for the making history expansion mission builder. They aren't ready for release yet but the source is here

One node simply kills the warp when triggered, the seconds checks that the active vessel has a specified part on it.

https://github.com/tomforwood/MHNodes

I'm interested if anyone else is thinking about extending MH?

Edited April 14, 2018 by tomf
